channel.title: Help me with java / jdk6 or something
channel.description:
If i want to start something like elven pk , Pkisle client with java i get this : [code] Elven Pk C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documenten\elven client>java -Xmx1024m -cp . ;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar client Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version n umber in .class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documenten\elven client>pause Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . . [/code]
Can anyone helpo me please?

item.title: Help me with java / jdk6 or something
item.dc:creator: @William.D William.D
item.description:
@William.D wrote:

Nope it’s not ,

But I already posted it in the Elven topic. No one will reply on me :’( . And this is the same by all other clients…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2007, 01:09:38 AM[/size][hr]Bump , PLease help :{

item.title: Help me with java / jdk6 or something
item.dc:creator: @William.D William.D
item.description:
@William.D wrote:

If i want to start something like elven pk , Pkisle client with java i get this :

Elven Pk
C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documenten\elven client>java -Xmx1024m -cp .
;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar client
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version n
umber in .class file
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)

C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documenten\elven client>pause
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

Can anyone helpo me please?
